subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Barzal scored in a shootout to lift Canada to a 3-2 win over Switzerland in the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland. Russia beat Belarus, 4-1.
snippet: Matt Barzal scored in a shootout to lift Canada to a 3-2 win over Switzerland in the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland. Russia beat Belarus, 4-1.
